author: Michelle Boorstein
title: Prominent Virginia pastor who said ‘God is larger than this dreaded virus’ dies of covid-19 - The Washington Post
description: Prominent Virginia pastor who said ‘God is larger than this dreaded virus’ dies of covid-19 The Washington Post Virginia pastor who defiantly held church service dies of coronavirus New York Post Bishop who said 'God is larger than this dreaded virus' dies of…
content:
He was a friend and a pillar of the regions faith community, U.S. Sen. Tim Kaine (D-Va.) tweeted Sunday.
My heart sinks as I learn this morning that Bishop Gerald Glenn, pastor of New Deliverance Evangelistic Church, died yesterday from COVID-19, Kaine said.… [+3593 chars]
